related_questions.question: What is the starting salary for a microbiologist?
related_questions.snippet: An Entry-Level Microbiologist earns an average salary of R155,778 per year. A skill in Biotechnology is associated with high pay for this job.
related_questions.title: Entry Level Microbiologist Salary (South Africa) - PayScale

related_questions.question: What is the work of a microbiologist?
related_questions.snippet: Microbiologists use a wide range of analytical and scientific techniques to monitor and study microbes such as algae, bacteria, fungi and viruses. Microbiologists work in a range of areas such as healthcare and agriculture.
related_questions.title: Microbiologist: job description | TARGETjobs

related_questions.question: How much does a microbiologist with a PHD make?
related_questions.snippet: The average salary for "phd microbiologist" ranges from approximately $49,807 per year for Post-doctoral Fellow to $88,973 per year for Senior Scientist.
